title: choosing one role
body:
Has there ever been talk of being able to pick one role? 

I've been maining support cos I enjoy itaand it's easy to get in normals to practice
I want to main mid but impossible yo get in normal and when I queue it as primary and supp second. . I get supp still

Have they ever talked about choosing say mid only.. Obviously id have a long wait but it would be nice to play mid :(

replies.body:
We first need Rito to pull their finger out and give us the same champ select as ranked in normals.

Currently you just have to be fast on the keyboard or you lose the role you want, and even than if you type that little to slow the other roles will get taken.

It doesn't really work well currently either, you get champs who pick whoever they want and just go into whatever role is left and troll.
